name: HSP_ACCT_SNF_PPS
description: When Minimum Data Set (MDS) assessments are performed per requirements of the CMS Skilled Nursing Facility Prospective Payment System (SNF PPS), the HIPPS codes generated will be coded to the appropriate hospital accounts. The HSP_ACCT_SNF_PPS table contains the data generated from the assessments required for billing and claims.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASMT_UNIQ_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the assessment entry for this hospital account. A single MDS assessment can general multiple assessment entries for a hospital account (for example, a therapy portion as well as a non-therapy portion could create two entries). There may be multiple RUG codes generated from a single MDS assessment record. Each RUG code may also have payer/plan overrides defined as well. ASMT_UNIQ_ID is used to identify the RUG code generated from the minimum data set (MDS) assessment, and OVRD_EPP_ID in addition is used to identify the payer/plan-specific RUG code.

columns.name: ASMT_DESC
columns.description: This columns contains the description for the assessment.

columns.name: ASMT_RDI_ID
columns.description: This column contains the a pointer to the Minimum Data Set (MDS) assessment record.

columns.name: OVRD_PLAN_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the plan if any payer/plan-specific overrides have been defined. A blank value in this column indicates the line of data applies to the facility-defined Medicare payer/plan. There may be multiple RUG codes generated from a single MDS assessment record. Each RUG code may also have payer/plan overrides defined as well. ASMT_UNIQ_ID is used to identify the RUG code generated from the MDS assessment, and OVRD_EPP_ID in addition is used to identify the payer/plan-specific RUG code.

columns.name: RUG_CODE
columns.description: This column stores the resource utilization group (RUG) code generated by the minimum data set (MDS) assessment.

columns.name: MDS_ASSESS_INDIC_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the assessment indicator (AI) of the minimum data set (MDS) assessment.
entries: 5-day or readm with Start of Therapy OMRA
5-day or readm with EOT OMRA without Resumption
5-day or readm with SOT & EOT without Resumption
5-day or readmission with Medicare Short Stay Assessment
Default code due to missed assessment
Unscheduled OBRA or Swing Bed CCA
End of Therapy OMRA without Resumption
SOT/EOT without Resumption with Unscheduled OBRA/CCA
Start of Therapy with End of Therapy Reporting Resumption
SOT/EOT-R with Unscheduled OBRA or Swing Bed CCA
5-day or readmission with EOT with Resumption

columns.name: ASMT_REF_DT
columns.description: This column stores the assessment reference date (ARD) of the minimum data set (MDS) assessment.

columns.name: BILL_START_DT
columns.description: This column contains the assessment billing effective start date.

columns.name: BILL_END_DT
columns.description: This column contains the assessment billing effective end date.

columns.name: BILL_DAYS
columns.description: This column stores the number of days that are billable by this minimum data set (MDS) assessment at the calculated RUG code specific to this hospital account. A single MDS assessment may span multiple hospital accounts; a single assessment's billing effective dates may extend beyond the billable dates of the hospital account.

columns.name: USR_OVERRIDE_YN
columns.description: This column stores whether the payer/plan-specific resource utilization group (RUG) code was automatically calculated from the minimum data set (MDS) assessment or manually entered by a user. This column will have no value for the facility-defined Medicare lines of this table.

columns.name: LOA_DAYS
columns.description: This column contains the total number of leave of absence days for this assessment period.

columns.name: PPS_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This related group stores coding grouper data for skilled nursing facilities based on clinical assessments. This item stores the type of prospective payment system code that is being stored in SNF PPS: PPS Code (I HAR 3505) for this assessment line.

columns.name: PDPM_CODE
columns.description: This column stores the patient driven payment model (PDPM) code generated by the minimum data set (MDS) assessment.
